html: Today, the Every Kid Outdoors Act, that U.S. Senator @MartinHeinrich and I introduced, was signed into law by @POTUS. The bill allows 4th graders and their families free entrance to all federal lands and waters, including national parks – more than 2,000 sites in all.
text:
Today, the Every Kid Outdoors Act, that U.S. Senator @MartinHeinrich and I introduced, was signed into law by @POTUS. 

The bill allows 4th graders and their families free entrance to all federal lands and waters, including national parks – more than 2,000 sites in all.
